creditline: Bequest from the Norman and Brenda Canedy Collection
description: image of the Virgin Mary holding Jesus, with small boy as John the Baptist cuddling the baby; Joseph, rendered as an older man located on L, with PL hand raised; faint structures in background; tree in ULC; medium wood frame with light brown washed pigment as patina, and a red velvet inner boarder
title: The Holy Family with the Young St. John the Baptist
